description:
Replace the Volume/SMTC UI with a custom one. Only for Windows 10 17763+

## How to add AudioFlyout to "permanently" replace Volume HUD?
See https://github.com/ADeltaX/AudioFlyout/blob/master/guide.md
![screenshot](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/chtof/chocolatey-packages/automatic/audioflyout/screenshot.png)
summary: Replace the Volume/SMTC UI with a custom one.
author: ADeltaX
